text: Hi boys and girls. Let's clap our hands together. Ready?
Clap your hands, clap your hands

Clap your hands, clap your hands
Let's clap now 1, 2, 3

Can you pat your knees? Let's do it together. 
Here we go!

Pat your knees, pat your knees
Pat your knees with me

Pat your knees, pat your knees
Let's pat now 1, 2, 3
Next, tap your head. Do it with me!

Tap your head, tap your head
Tap your head with me

Tap your head, tap your head
Let's tap now 1, 2, 3
Can you touch your toes? Let's do it together

Touch your toes, touch your toes
Touch your toes with me

Touch your toes, touch your toes
Let's touch now 1, 2, 3
And last, stomp your feet. Stomp with me!

Stomp your feet, stomp your feet
Stomp your feet with me

Stomp your feet, stomp your feet
Let's stomp now 1, 2, 3
